info.abstract:
The Fast AFM and CV component uses Python Logistic Regression function to generate results for AFM and Cross Validation in a relatively fast speed.
See demo workflow.
info.description: This component uses Python Logistic Regression function to generate results for AFM and Cross Validation in a relatively fast speed.

inputs.p: A tab-delimited file. Although ideally this component uses the Datashop Student-step export file, it can also run with the following minimum columns (column headers have to match exactly, see demo workflow for details):

ol.li: Problem Hierarchy, can be empty as long as either Problem Name or Step Name has value
Problem Name, can be empty as long as either Problem Hierarchy or Step Name has value
Step Name, can be empty as long as either Problem Hierarchy or Problem Name has value
First Transaction Time, can't be empty
First Attempt, acceptable values are correct/incorrect/hint

inputs.p: Other requirement for the input file: data needs to be ordered by Anon Student Id and then by First Transaction Time

ul.li: A analysis-summary.txt, mimicing Datashop model values export report
A student-step file with the predicted error rate of the selected KC model replaced by the newly computed prediction
An XML file with the coefficients of the logistic regression model
An XML file with the skills' and students' parameters computed by the logistic regression model
Compute cross validation: yes or no, whether to compute cross validation RMSE
What type of cross valication: item blocked, student blocked or both, default is both
Cross validation fold: maxium allowed is 10, default is 3
